word: Many will go out to labor for the Master who have not been able to take a regular course of study in school. God will help these workers. They will obtain knowledge from the higher school, and will be fitted to take their position in the rank and file of workers as nurses. The great Medical Missionary sees every effort that is made to find access to souls by presenting the principles of health reform.--"Review," Nov. 19, 1903. See also, "Testimonies for the Church," Vol. VIII, p. 168.
